definitions: a tree or trees that have been blown down by the wind

examples.text: crews will be removing blowdown for a number of days

shortDefinitions: trees that have been blown down by wind

definitions: the blowing down of a tree or trees

examples.text: the measures did not prevent mass blowdown

shortDefinitions: blowing down of tree or trees

definitions: the removal of solids or liquids from a container or pipe using pressure

examples.text: designs had to withstand blowdown conditions

shortDefinitions: removal of solids or liquids from container or pipe using pressure
